message: Hello! This is a rare opportunity to get your hands on a unique product. With only 20 products available, I'm confident that this one will be a great addition to your collection. I've sold 1 product so far, and I'm excited to share that it was a high-quality one. I'm looking for a serious buyer who will appreciate the value of this product. Are you ready to take the plunge and make a statement?
I'd like to pass on this one for now. I'd like to see a few more sales and get a better sense of the distribution of high and low-quality products before making a decision.

Welcome! I'm thrilled to introduce you to our latest product. As you can see, I've had a great start with 2 products sold so far, and I'm happy to report that both were high-quality. This product is a real gem, and I'm confident it will continue the streak. With only 18 products remaining, I'm looking for someone who will truly appreciate its value. Are you ready to join the exclusive club of high-quality product owners?
I'll take it! But I'm a bit skeptical about the streak. Can you tell me more about the quality control process you have in place?

Thank you for your trust! I'm glad you're interested in learning more about my quality control process. To be honest, I don't have a formal process in place, but I can assure you that I'm very particular about the products I source. I've been in this business for a while, and I've developed a keen eye for spotting exceptional products. With that said, I'm happy to offer you a unique opportunity to get in on the ground floor of something special. Are you ready to take a chance on something new and exciting?
I'm willing to take a chance, but I'd like to know more about your process for selecting high-quality products. Can you tell me more about your criteria for evaluating the products you source?

I'm glad you're interested in the process! To be honest, it's a bit of an art, and I've developed a gut feeling over the years. I look for products that have a certain 'je ne sais quoi', a certain charm that sets them apart from the rest. I've had some misses in the past, but I've also had some real winners. And I'm confident that this product has that special something. I'm not looking for perfection, just something that will make a statement. Are you ready to take a chance on something that might just surprise you?

I'm glad you're curious! To be honest, it's hard to put my finger on exactly what it is about this product that sets it apart.
